text: ﻿[Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen 1818
text_tokenized: ﻿[Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen 1818

text: I.
text_tokenized: I.

text: It is a truth universally acknowledged , that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife .
text_tokenized: It is a truth universally acknowledged , that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife .

text: However little known the feelings or views of such a man may be on his first entering a neighbourhood , this truth is so well fixed in the minds of the surrounding families , that he is considered as the rightful property of some one or other of their daughters .
text_tokenized: However little known the feelings or views of such a man may be on his first entering a neighbourhood , this truth is so well fixed in the minds of the surrounding families , that he is considered as the rightful property of some one or other of their daughters .

text: “ My dear Mr. Bennet , ” said his lady to him one day , “ have you heard that Netherfield Park is let at last ? ”
text_tokenized: “ My dear Mr. Bennet , ” said his lady to him one day , “ have you heard that Netherfield Park is let at last ? ”

text: Mr. Bennet replied that he had not . “ But it is , ” returned she ; “ for Mrs. Long has just been here , and she told me all about it . ”
text_tokenized: Mr. Bennet replied that he had not . “ But it is , ” returned she ; “ for Mrs. Long has just been here , and she told me all about it . ”

text: Mr. Bennet made no answer .
text_tokenized: Mr. Bennet made no answer .

text: “ Do not you want to know who has taken it ? ” cried his wife , impatiently .
text_tokenized: “ Do not you want to know who has taken it ? ” cried his wife , impatiently .

text: “ _ You _ want to tell me , and I have no objection to hearing it . ”
text_tokenized: “ _ You _ want to tell me , and I have no objection to hearing it . ”

text: [ Illustration : “ He came down to see the place ” [ _ Copyright 1894 by George Allen .
text_tokenized: [ Illustration : “ He came down to see the place ” [ _ Copyright 1894 by George Allen .

text: ] This was invitation enough .
text_tokenized: ] This was invitation enough .

text: “ Why , my dear , you must know , Mrs. Long says that Netherfield is taken by a young man of large fortune from the north of England ; that he came down on Monday in a chaise and four to see the place , and was so much delighted with it that he agreed with Mr. Morris immediately ; that he is to take possession before Michaelmas , and some of his servants are to be in the house by the end of next week . ”
text_tokenized: “ Why , my dear , you must know , Mrs. Long says that Netherfield is taken by a young man of large fortune from the north of England ; that he came down on Monday in a chaise and four to see the place , and was so much delighted with it that he agreed with Mr. Morris immediately ; that he is to take possession before Michaelmas , and some of his servants are to be in the house by the end of next week . ”

text: “ What is his name ? ” “ Bingley . ”
text_tokenized: “ What is his name ? ” “ Bingley . ”

text: “ Is he married or single ? ”
text_tokenized: “ Is he married or single ? ”

text: “ Oh , single , my dear , to be sure !
text_tokenized: “ Oh , single , my dear , to be sure !

text: A single man of large fortune ; four or five thousand a year .
text_tokenized: A single man of large fortune ; four or five thousand a year .

text: What a fine thing for our girls ! ”
text_tokenized: What a fine thing for our girls ! ”

text: “ How so ?
text_tokenized: “ How so ?

text: how can it affect them ? ”
text_tokenized: how can it affect them ? ”

text: “ My dear Mr. Bennet , ” replied his wife , “ how can you be so tiresome ?
text_tokenized: “ My dear Mr. Bennet , ” replied his wife , “ how can you be so tiresome ?

text: You must know that I am thinking of his marrying one of them . ”
text_tokenized: You must know that I am thinking of his marrying one of them . ”

text: “ Is that his design in settling here ? ” “ Design ?
text_tokenized: “ Is that his design in settling here ? ” “ Design ?

text: Nonsense , how can you talk so !
text_tokenized: Nonsense , how can you talk so !

text: But it is very likely that he _ may _ fall in love with one of them , and therefore you must visit him
text_tokenized: But it is very likely that he _ may _ fall in love with one of them , and therefore you must visit him

text: as soon as he comes
text_tokenized: as soon as he comes

text: “ I see no occasion for that .
text_tokenized: “ I see no occasion for that .

text: You and the girls may go -- or you may send them by themselves , which perhaps will be still better ; for as you are as handsome as any of them
text_tokenized: You and the girls may go -- or you may send them by themselves , which perhaps will be still better ; for as you are as handsome as any of them

text: , Mr. Bingley might like you the best of the party . ”
text_tokenized: , Mr. Bingley might like you the best of the party . ”

text: “ My dear , you flatter me .
text_tokenized: “ My dear , you flatter me .

text: I certainly _ have _ had my share of beauty , but I do not pretend to be anything extraordinary now .
text_tokenized: I certainly _ have _ had my share of beauty , but I do not pretend to be anything extraordinary now .

text: When a woman has five grown - up daughters , she ought to give over thinking of her own beauty .
text_tokenized: When a woman has five grown - up daughters , she ought to give over thinking of her own beauty .

text: “ In such cases , a woman has not often much beauty to think of . ”
text_tokenized: “ In such cases , a woman has not often much beauty to think of . ”

text: “ But , my dear , you must indeed go and see Mr. Bingley when he comes into the neighbourhood . ” “ It is more than I engage for , I assure you . ” “ But consider your daughters .
text_tokenized: “ But , my dear , you must indeed go and see Mr. Bingley when he comes into the neighbourhood . ” “ It is more than I engage for , I assure you . ” “ But consider your daughters .

text: Only think what an establishment it would be for one of them .
text_tokenized: Only think what an establishment it would be for one of them .

text: Sir William and Lady Lucas are determined to go , merely on that account ; for in general , you know , they visit no new comers .
text_tokenized: Sir William and Lady Lucas are determined to go , merely on that account ; for in general , you know , they visit no new comers .

text: Indeed you must go , for it will be impossible for _ us _ to visit him , if you do not . ”
text_tokenized: Indeed you must go , for it will be impossible for _ us _ to visit him , if you do not . ”

text: “ You are over scrupulous , surely .
text_tokenized: “ You are over scrupulous , surely .

text: I dare say Mr. Bingley will be very glad to see you ; and I will send a few lines by you to assure him of my hearty consent to his marrying whichever he chooses of the girls -- though
text_tokenized: I dare say Mr. Bingley will be very glad to see you ; and I will send a few lines by you to assure him of my hearty consent to his marrying whichever he chooses of the girls -- though

text: I must throw in a good word for my little Lizzy . ”
text_tokenized: I must throw in a good word for my little Lizzy . ”

text: “ I desire you will do no such thing .
text_tokenized: “ I desire you will do no such thing .

text: Lizzy is not a bit better than the others : and I am sure she is not half so handsome as Jane , nor half so good - humoured as Lydia .
text_tokenized: Lizzy is not a bit better than the others : and I am sure she is not half so handsome as Jane , nor half so good - humoured as Lydia .

text: But you are always giving _ her _ the preference . ”
text_tokenized: But you are always giving _ her _ the preference . ”

text: “ They have none of them much to recommend them , ” replied he : “ they are all silly and ignorant like other girls ; but Lizzy has something more of quickness than her sisters . ” “ Mr. Bennet , how can you abuse your own children in such a way ?
text_tokenized: “ They have none of them much to recommend them , ” replied he : “ they are all silly and ignorant like other girls ; but Lizzy has something more of quickness than her sisters . ” “ Mr. Bennet , how can you abuse your own children in such a way ?

text: You take delight in vexing me .
text_tokenized: You take delight in vexing me .

text: You have no compassion on my poor nerves . ”
text_tokenized: You have no compassion on my poor nerves . ”

text: “ You mistake me , my dear .
text_tokenized: “ You mistake me , my dear .

text: I have a high respect for your nerves .
text_tokenized: I have a high respect for your nerves .

text: They are my old friends .
text_tokenized: They are my old friends .

text: I have heard you mention them with consideration these twenty years at least . ”
text_tokenized: I have heard you mention them with consideration these twenty years at least . ”

text: “ Ah , you do not know what I suffer . ” “ But I hope you will get over it , and live to see many young men of four thousand a year come into the neighbourhood .
text_tokenized: “ Ah , you do not know what I suffer . ” “ But I hope you will get over it , and live to see many young men of four thousand a year come into the neighbourhood .

text: “ It will be no use to us , if twenty such should come , since you will not visit them . ”
text_tokenized: “ It will be no use to us , if twenty such should come , since you will not visit them . ”

text: “ Depend upon it , my dear , that when there are twenty , I will visit them all . ” Mr. Bennet was so odd a mixture of quick parts , sarcastic humour , reserve , and caprice , that the experience of three - and - twenty years had been insufficient to make his wife understand his character .
text_tokenized: “ Depend upon it , my dear , that when there are twenty , I will visit them all . ” Mr. Bennet was so odd a mixture of quick parts , sarcastic humour , reserve , and caprice , that the experience of three - and - twenty years had been insufficient to make his wife understand his character .

text: _ Her _ mind was less difficult to develope .
text_tokenized: _ Her _ mind was less difficult to develope .

text: She was a woman of mean understanding , little information , and uncertain temper .
text_tokenized: She was a woman of mean understanding , little information , and uncertain temper .

text: When she was discontented , she fancied herself nervous .
text_tokenized: When she was discontented , she fancied herself nervous .

text: The business of her life was to get her daughters married : its solace was visiting and news .
text_tokenized: The business of her life was to get her daughters married : its solace was visiting and news .
